hdmioutput: Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i
monitor: 6.7 cm (2.7-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
weight: Approx. 160 g (including battery and SD memory card)
batterylifeenel19: Still pictures: Approx. 250 shots Movies: Approx. 1h 40 min (HD 720p). The maximum file size for a single movie is 4 GB and the maximum movie length for a single movie is 29 minutes, even when there is sufficient free space on the memory card for longer recording.
isosensitivity: ISO 80, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200 Auto (auto gain from ISO 80 to 1600) Fixed range auto (ISO 80 to 400, 80 to 800)
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (supplied) AC Adapter EH-62F (available separately)
lens: 10x optical zoom, NIKKOR lens 4.5-45.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-250 mm lens in 35mm [135] format) f/3.2-5.8; Digital zoom Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 1000 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 74 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12, Charging AC Adapter EH-69P, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio Video Cable EG-CP16, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; total pixels: approx. 16.44 million
focusrangefromlens: [W]: Approx. 50 cm to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1.0 m to infinity, Macro mode: Approx. 10 cm to infinity ( wide-angle position )
